name: flux-portrait-generator
title: AI Portrait Generator with Flux
description: Create stunning AI-generated portraits from text prompts using Flux model.
extendedDescription: Transform your creative vision into photorealistic portraits with this powerful Flux-based workflow. The template leverages the latest Flux model architecture to generate high-quality portraits from simple text descriptions. Whether you need professional headshots, artistic portraits, or character concepts, this workflow delivers exceptional results with minimal setup.
howToUse: Enter your portrait description in the positive prompt node
Adjust the negative prompt to exclude unwanted features
Click Queue Prompt to generate your portrait
Fine-tune with seed values for variations
metaDescription: Generate photorealistic AI portraits with Flux in ComfyUI. Free workflow template for creating stunning portraits from text prompts.

faqItems.question: What resolution works best for Flux portraits?
faqItems.answer: Flux performs optimally at 1024x1024 resolution, though it can generate quality outputs at various aspect ratios.

faqItems.question: How long does generation take?
faqItems.answer: On a modern GPU (RTX 3080 or better), expect 15-30 seconds per image at default settings.
